column2: Converse Men's All Star Canvas Mono Hi Black Shoe
column27:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • Dedicated to Basketball champ Chuck Taylor
column28: this Chuck Taylor All-Star series from converse are also called Chucks and come in classic designs. Created using canvas and rubber
column29: this range of sneakers from Converse was initially designed to capture the basketball market
column30:
but soon enough turned into a hot casual footwear favourite.


Upper

  • Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability


  • High ankle for added comfort to the foot and leg


  • Upper with plaid check print


  • Carbon rubber toe box for enhanced protection of the upper foot


  • Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug fitLace-ups through metal eyelets for snug Fit and durability

 

Midsole

  • Comfort Insole made of contoured latex foam for high energy return and cushioning

 

Outsole

 

  • Vulcanized rubber outsole for flexibility and traction


  • Diamond-shaped lugs on the forefoot and heel
column31: with horizontal lugsand grooves on the toe region and heel region
column32:
and slanting grooves along the periphery and midfoot for superior grip on all terrains 

 

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda
column33:
1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water 

  • Material & Care

  • Click here for the perfect care products for shoes made of textile/fabric

  • Size & Fit

  • Please note that Converse's sizing runs half-size larger than standard. Refer the size chart for details.

column2: Converse Unisex AS Canvas OX Black Casual Shoes
column27:
• Product Description
  • Style Note


  • Product Details

  • These low top shoes are inspired by converse's lucky charm Chuck Taylor - Basketball player turned salesman. Iconic and synonymous with style and youth culture
column28: these shoes reflect a fusion of sport and style. Wear this with form fitting denims
column29:
a monochrome tee and a casual jacket.

Upper
Canvas upper with stitch detailing for shoe structure
Central lacing system with a long tongue for comfort
Rubber overlay on the toe box to protect the toe region
Reinforced overlay at the heel region for good shoe structure
Metal eyelets on the midfoot for ventilation

Midsole
PU midsole with branding on the heel and PU foxing on the toe region

Outsole
Rubber outsole with terraced grooves and patterned lugs


  • Material & Care

  • Canvas
    Wipe with a clean white cloth when needed
    Click here for the perfect care products for shoes made of textile/fabric

  • Size & Fit

  • Please note that Converse's sizing runs half-size larger than standard. Refer the size chart for details.
